Description: You have failed as may be necessary to prevent danger, the Allenwest Motor Control Centre's identified as MCC's A, B, C, C1, D, E, F & 8 shall be maintained so as to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, such danger, in that you failed to act upon and complete the planned major maintenance by the dates detailed in your maintenance schedule (2016 Flotta Arc Flash Maintenance Prioritisation Plan) and subsequent revised dates and relevant conclusions and recommendations in your investigation (EA Technology Report No. A2528_1 Issue 1).
